TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1165
TEI.2.document_title: James Gaines to Stephen F Austin, 08-13-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Gaines to Austin, August 13, 1825. Concerning a Negro stolen from Louisiana.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1165

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Gaines to Austin, August 13, 1825. Concerning a Negro stolen from Louisiana.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Sabine */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-13-1825">August 13th 1825.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Steven F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr. Sir I Regret to inform you the Documents on Examination are mislaid as Respects the Changes alluded to in my Letter all I can Recollect of them is as follows*/p*
*p*A young man by the name of *person_mentioned*Dally */person_mentioned*stold a Likely *person_mentioned*negro man*/person_mentioned* of *person_mentioned*Henry Collins*/person_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*River amite*/location_mentioned*, in the *location_mentioned*Parish of East Batonrouge State of Louisiana*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">some time last year*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr. Collins*/person_mentioned* sent a young man by the name of *person_mentioned*West */person_mentioned*to the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">Last year */date_mentioned*in pursuit of him but Returnd without success he *person_mentioned*Mr. Collins*/person_mentioned* then sent me the Documents to Continue the inquiry until I made a Discovery*/p*
*p*My inquiries has been as follows I found this *person_mentioned*Dally */person_mentioned*went to *location_mentioned*Pecan Point*/location_mentioned* with the *person_mentioned*negro */person_mentioned*and Changed his name from *person_mentioned*Dally */person_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*Lively */person_mentioned**date_mentioned n="Summer-1825">Early this summer*/date_mentioned* he came to the *location_mentioned*naches */location_mentioned*where a young man Lived by the name of *person_mentioned*Lively */person_mentioned*this *person_mentioned*Lively */person_mentioned*Lived at*location_mentioned**person_mentioned* Ellis Bean*/person_mentioned*s */location_mentioned*and was a *person_mentioned*partner of Dalleys */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*on the River amite in Luciana*/location_mentioned* when *person_mentioned*Dalley */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Lively */person_mentioned*met *person_mentioned*Lively */person_mentioned*calld him *person_mentioned*Dally */person_mentioned*but after some apology they passed for *person_mentioned*Brs */person_mentioned*there and Left the *location_mentioned*naches */location_mentioned*with the *person_mentioned*negro */person_mentioned*for the *location_mentioned*upper settlements on the Brasss*/location_mentioned* and was there a Rasing ... [illegible] some Time ago another one of the *person_mentioned*Dalley*/person_mentioned*s has Lately passdd out in pursuit of them and Likely will pass by the name of *person_mentioned*Lively*/person_mentioned*, a young man went out Lately with *person_mentioned*Mr. Lakely*/person_mentioned* I am told Can Explain Probably the whole affair I have wrote on to *person_mentioned*Mr. Collins*/person_mentioned*, and shall shortly Expect him on*/p*
*p*I hope for the sake of humanity you will secure the *person_mentioned*negro */person_mentioned*and Damage If possible for 18 months services of the *person_mentioned*negro */person_mentioned*together per Costs of Suit until the Said *person_mentioned*Henry Collins*/person_mentioned* may come or send*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas Gaines */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
